testcase.name: TC19 fake degerler ile giris yapilamamali
testcase.system-out: Given kullanici "webUniUrl" anasayfaya gider................................passed When login Portal'a kadar asagi iner.......................................passed And login Portal'a tiklar...................................................passed Then acilan yeni window'a gecis yapar.......................................passed And username ve password kutularina fake degerler yazdirir..................passed And webDriverUniversity login butonuna basar................................passed Then popup'ta cikan yazinin "validation failed" oldugunu test eder..........passed And OK diyerek popup'i kapatir..............................................passed When ilk windowa geri doner.................................................passed Then ilk windowa donuldugunu test eder......................................passed And 3 saniye bekler.........................................................passed And sayfayi kapatir.........................................................passed
